arts.ttl: ‘Rodri saved football’ – Brother of Barcelona star takes aim at Real Madrid’s Vinícius Jr.

arts.ttl: Barcelona on alert: A new club want to sign Vitor Roque permanently in January
arts.sum: A new suitor have positioned themselves in the fray for the signing of on-loan Barcelona star Vitor Roque. That’s according to Diario Sport, citing Brazilian outlet UOL Esporte, who point…

arts.ttl: Rayo Vallecano pushing hard to sign Bundesliga striker on loan
arts.sum: Rayo Vallecano have had a relatively good season up until now, as they sit in 13th position in the La Liga table. However, they will have ambitions to go higher, and if they can strengthen during the winter transfer window, they are more than capable of making a push for the European places.
